name: Overspin
description:
Action-packed 3D endless runner!

Race through 3D town, build your unique team and join weekly tournaments!

Collect coins and upgrade powerful power-ups!
Run with friends, beat their scores and claim awesome rewards!

Key Features:
- Achievements
- Missions
- Daily bonus
- Weekly tournaments
- Daily challenge
- Leaderboards
- Upgrades
- Awesome characters
- Weekly quests
And more...

Let's Roll !"
